alert.note: Alert for Cooke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 9:30PM CDT until June 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR COOKE COUNTY... At 929 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over central Cooke County, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Muenster, Lindsay, Lake Muenster, Hubert H Moss Lake, Road Runner, Valley View, Walnut Bend, Prairie Point, Leo, Rosston, Lois, Marysville, Sivells Bend, Era, Hood, Myra and Lake Ray Roberts. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Texas. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
